ygData.subject: Re: Solar Flare ((Nic-ooc))-->Jerame
ygData.msgSnippet: I know I m not a GM but I couldn t help but noticing the thread. Considering that Primus is around- it could be possible for him to amplify a bot s powers,

I know I'm not a GM but I couldn't help but noticing
the thread. Considering that Primus is around- it
could be possible for him to amplify a bot's powers,
like where Shadimus is about to become a channel to
Primus' powers- however, I think that it needs to be
treated like overloading anything- ie that the boost
results in severe internal damage that takes quite
some time for the bot in question to fully recover
from (lets just say on that front thet Shadimus is not
gonna be a pretty site once he's performed the conduit
attack on Unicron).

 --- airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
Airly:

I think that it's alittle powerful too, 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic"
<Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Maybe, but still, manipulating solar flares is
a mighty 
power, 
> a bit too mighty for my tastes. Robo, Airly, what do
you think of 
> that? Is it too much for one bot that is not a NPC?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson
<jeramej@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: It puts Unicron in a tuff situation though.
He would need 
to 
> Defend Earth from the Flare or else it is Good Bye
to the Energon 
> and the Matrix. Or he lets the Solar Flare hit the
Earth. Either 
way 
> he has to move his Orbit thus throwing off his
attack sequence 
bro. 
> Think of it Stratigically.Almost like a game of
Chess and Unicron 
is 
> in Check.
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:OOC: A solar flare
coming up to 
> Unicron would catch the earth at the 
> > same time. besides, he has this huge cannon fodder
army to block 
> > himself.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson
<jeramej@y...> 
wrote:
> > > Sonicc Storm:
> > > Closes his Eyes and begins to Concentrate on
Unicron voice to 
> see 
> > telepathically where Unicron is. After seeing
where Unicron is 
he 
> > then Telepathically Checks the Sun for a Solar
Flare. He then 
> Locks 
> > on the the Solar Flare and intesifyes it spout and
Directs its 
raw 
> > Force Towards Unicron. to Score a Direct hit on
Unicron.
> > > 
> > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Perceptor:
> > > 
> > > "Soon it will be done"replied the male "And soon
Our fight 
will 
> > > start"
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson
<jeramej@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > > Sonic Storm:
> > > > Watching his new form take shape over his body
he grins. "I 
> > shall

nice."
